room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: Just did the Asylum escape room. Didn't get out but it was a lot of fun, a little creepy. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants an amazing challenge. It derserves more than just 5 stars.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: The Asylum was my first escape room and it was a blast! Many challenging puzzles but our group escaped. Christopher did an amazing job running the experience. Amazing birthday party and met some really nice people.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: We took my SIL to "The Asylum" to celebrate her 50th birthday. We had a blast! We were punching in codes to escape when we ran out of time. It had some very interesting puzzles to solve and we were "shocked" by some,lol! I will go back again.

room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape Zone 60 in Pensacola
review: Asylum was fun and challenging. Asa was great with just enough help to keep us from going crazy and having to stay! Well done room with a variety of puzzles to really make you think and work for it. Will be back to try their other room for sure.
